dcterms:creator: Z. Li
A. Shaban
J. G. Simard

S. P. DiMaio
O. Mohareri
dcterms:description: This dataset contains 7980 densely annotated depth images captured by four different ToF cameras placed on the da Vinci robot, collected in a clinical development lab simulating different robot-assisted laparoscopic procedures.
dcterms:title: Operating Room Semantic Segmentation Dataset

dcterms:creator: A. S. Aidean
H. Helene
O. Daniel
M. Omid
dcterms:description: This dataset consists of videos recorded from a single medical facility with two robotic ORs, containing 400 videos of around two hours, annotated with ten clinically relevant OR activities.
dcterms:title: Operating Room Activity Classification Dataset
